sentence.Network_en: His purse, which was very dry at that moment , did not permit him any other equipage.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时他正囊空如洗, 不可能有别种坐骑.

sentence.Network_en: Some time elapsed, when my attention were excited by the slow approach of an equipage.
sentence.Network_cn: 过了一会儿, 一辆缓缓驶过的马车引起了我的注意.

sentence.Network_en: We stopped at the entrance of a wood, waiting for the arrival of our equipage.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在树林的进口处停了下来, 等待我们装备的到来.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (denoting the crew of a ship): from French équipage, from équiper 'equip'

means.word_mean: 1. equipment and supplies of a military force
2. a vehicle with four wheels drawn by two or more horses
